Chat

Mentions

Landline supports @user mentions, which will be parsed as a link to the mentioned user's profile_url.

You can also reference a #room, which will turn into a link to that chat room for your team.

Emoji

Landline uses Emoji One client-side for all of your expressive messaging needs.

Check out emoji.codes for shortcuts, and feel free to submit a PR for better shortcut support in Landline.

Formatting

Landline supports a limited subset of Markdown-like formatting.

  • *bold* text is surrounded by asterisks (*)
  • _italicized_ text is surrounded by underscores (_)
  • https://links.com will be formatted as long as they are preceded by http[s]://.

Landline is being built with ❤ on Assembly
